summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding a title insurance quote request related to a property purchase by 'Granite Reality LLC'. Steve Marshal is seeking updates on the necessary documents and title insurance for the closing scheduled on December 13, 2019.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is inquiring about the status of documents and title insurance for a property closing.

events.title: Property Closing
events.description: The closing for the property purchase by Granite Reality LLC is scheduled to take place.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is requesting a title insurance quote for a property purchase.
The property is being purchased by 'Granite Reality LLC'.
Closing documents will be executed by the Boston law firm Nutter on behalf of the LLC.
The home will be insured through USAA starting on the closing date of December 13, 2019.
There is a fraud alert warning against wiring funds without verification.
